radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous small hemorrhagic strokes in both hemispheres and the cerebellum.
New prosthetic valve vegetation with abscess formation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete dehiscence of the valve in the absence of vegetations observed 2 months after discharge.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Large right-frontal hemisphere bleed with mass effect.

radiographic_examinations.date: Post-operative follow-up after aortic root and ascending aorta replacement
radiographic_examinations.findings: No vegetations or abscesses were seen in the operating room; all specimens were sterile.
